name: Exalegiuse
overview: Exalegiuse is an strategy game in which the player takes the role of a commander of one of the space fleets that are on war, in each turn the player can decide where to move his space ships, the player can buy new ships for his army, improve their weapons. The game is divided into different missions and the story advance if the player can complete each mission defeating all the enemies troops. But the big issue of the game is that each battle turn takes a lot of time to be completed so the gameplay is really boring, and there aren't so much things to do in each turn.
